Çok kısa bir bölüm. Hızlıca 12-13 dakika da biter. Yapay zeka ve fizik biraz vasat. Bu arada şu kliseye direk kapıdan giriliyormuş amk 10 dakika yandaki inşaattan giriş aradım. Keşke gravity gun ile kapıya sıkmak yerine "E" ye bassaymışım.
好
и че
Its cool, its like one of those many combine ambushes from hl2 ecxept for free and has cool graphics!

Kolejna gra Valve...no w sumie nie można nazwać tego grą, a giereczką lub darmowym poziomem. 

Gra jest darmowa, bo dostajemy ją od razu po kupnie normalnego Half-Life 2. Gameplay jest oczywiście na standardzie serii Half-Life, czyli dość dynamiczny i nie ma chwil nudy :) Grafika mimo długiego czasu od premiery nie zestarzała się strasznie. Mimo tego iż gra jest bardzo krótka, jest warta uwagi. 

Zalety: 
- Darmowy dodatek do Half-Life 2
- Fajnie się gra
- Bardzo ładna grafika

Wady:
- Krótka (dobremu graczowi zajmie 15 minut)

Polecam zagrać ten poziom od razu po przejściu Half-Life'a 2. :)
проходится за 15 минут, в чем прикол я так и не понял.
Half-Life 2: Lost Coast is a tech demo, for about 20 minutes of gameplay. I enjoyed it for what it is, with its great graphics and commentaries by the developers including Gabe Newell.
Nice free addition for those wanting more from Half-Life 2. No reason not to download it. There is a commentary by the developers as well.

A beautiful presentation for the Source Engine's capability for lighting, textures, and shading. This was a really cool experience. Some nice gameplay also, and some cool insight into how Valve does their stuff. Really cool.
Eu gostava de ter visto este mapa no Half-Life 2
Buen juego
To będzie krótkie tak, jak krótka jest ta gra.
Самое длинное дополнение на свете

The Lost Coast is a bite-sized portion of beautiful Half-Life gameplay. The world and obstacles are built in a way that feels natural, making it a joy to explore and figure out.

This mission took a while to download, so I only wish it were longer <3

You can enable developer commentary, but I definitely recommend you save that for a second playthrough. It's interesting, but I enjoyed it more by first playing the mission at my regular pace.
Really a fun experience. It's very short though as its cut content from hl2. Fun if you enjoy half life and want to squeeze a little more enjoyment out of it
you can beat it in the time it takes me to take a shit
行了，知道G胖的邮箱了，让我们来轰炸吧
说句实话，这个测试的demo确实做的很棒，但是原版半条命2却没有把demo里的部分效果完全表现出来，期待半条命3发售前的demo

Хороший раздел, жалко что вырезали. В самом начале нас встречает лодочник, и пропускает нас дальше, что бы мы спасли жителей. Мы поднимаемя на гору, в маленький городок, или♥♥♥♥♥♥что то. Там в какой то церкви, мы должны сломать "машину", или что то тип того, и убить штурмовиков, и после чего взорвать вертолет, спустится к лодочнику, и все.
Не знаю почему людям не нравится, из-за того что коротко ? Так это вырезанная глава, и демонстрация нового движка, и глупо по-этому писать плохие отзывы. Прохождение на 10-15 минут, можно скоротать время перед чем-то.
Apenas uma fase que foi deixada de fora, na minha opinião não existe necessidade de fato em jogar. Capítulo curto com puzzle e ação nada de muito especial.
Уж очень короткая!!!Как и мой обзор)))
Best game I've ever played.
Çok kısaydı 25 combine bile oldurmemisimdir 2 heli indirdim  sonra parkurla assagıya iniyosun bitiyo keske az daha emek olsaydı.

Even though it's extremely short I spend nearly 8 hours in it, trying out glitches to get out of the map etc. I had some fun :d

half-life2

¿Qué es Half-Life 2: Lost Coast? Pues es una DEMO de lo que hubiera sido este escenario en el capítulo "Autopista 17" de Half-Life 2 aprovechando y demostrando las capacidades del motor Source.
El "juego" incluye los comentarios de los desarrolladores explicando cosas interesantes del escenario como la iluminación y el brillo del agua.
Lo malo es que se puede acabar en menos de 1 hora pero durante ese tiempo es una experiencia muy agradable en especial por esos comentarios de los desarrolladores. 

Pasaras un buen rato de juego y matar el tiempo como lo haces con los combine ;) .
Beep beep lettuce
OYUN ACAİP KISA BİR HALF-LİFE SERİSİNİ OYNUYAN BİRİ OLARAK OYUN SADECE TEK BİR BÖLÜM VE TEK BİR BÖLÜM HALF LİFE BİLMEYENLER İÇİN BİLE 3 DK FELAN SÜRER AMA GİNEDE HALF-LİFE

Un scénario et une mise en scène digne de Nolan épaulé par Spielberg, une bande son composée par Hans Zimmer, John Williams et Harry-Gregson Williams. Le tout vous transportant pendant 10 à 15h de jeu et .... Ah non, en fait c'est une démo technique qui introduis le HDR, du coup en 10 min on a fait le tour.

Mais ça va, j'ai apprécié.

amma ve lakin haritanın yüksek boyutu ve çıkış tarihini sekteye uğratacak bir yapıya sahip olduğu için oyuna eklenmeyen ama meraklısı içinde ayrı bir şekilde indirebileceği Half life 2'nin bir parçası diyebiliriz.

Short, sweet, but just what I needed to distract from some persistent headweasels before going to sleep. Easy to immerse in and out of, with the same appealing graphics and setting as the main game.

Apesar de ser muito curto (você irá finalizá-lo em 10 minutos), o jogo não é ruim.

It's a good test for a computer's graphics and general preformance. Would recommend for PC benchmarking.
Çok Kısaydı Hızlı Olursanız 10 Dakika Bile Sürmez Amacı Neydi neye Hizmet Etttik Neden Oynadık Ne Oldu Yani Bitince Hiçbirşey Anlamadım Zaman Kaybı Çünkü Amaçsız .!

This is my fifth time finishing a Half-Life game. Review Half-Life 2: Lost Coast? There really isn’t much to review, as the whole expansion/cut content is only really around 20 minutes, but for what it’s worth, it’s decent. I can tell why it was cut because it really doesn’t add much to the game with barely any dialogue and nothing too special about the map, but I still enjoyed it. Also to note, there is an option for the developers to talk over your gameplay about Lost Coast which is pretty cool. Overall, I do recommend this if you have Half-Life 2 because it is included for free and gives some insight on what Half-Life 2 could’ve been like, 8/10.

It's a really good level. Don't expect this huge expierence tho. Just expect one single level. Think of it as a deleted scene. It was supposed to be in half life 2 but they removed it and instead made it to show off what the source engine could do.
그래픽도 적당하고 할 만한 게임.
Why did I got lost on a coast?
即使拿到现在也一样很厉害的技术演示！

A short adventure that really lets you appreciate Half-Life 2 much more, I never paid any attention to the details of the game before playing this, but now I understand how much work and thought went into it. I enjoyed this very much, if you have it you should definitely play it, it's really short and totally worth it.

Короткий, но интересненький эпизод, вырезанный из оригинального Half-life 2. Здесь Гордону Фримену предстоит освободить городок Святая Ольга от Альянса. Игра сама по себе демонстрирует возможности HDR (HIGH DYNAMIC RANGE) на движке Source. Рекомендую.
Easy but too short game
游戏总运行了20分钟，画面好，没毛病！:-D

Northing too special about this compared to the half life roster 
but its got decent graphics, the same enemys and pretty quick to complete, 
though oddly addictive as the map design is quite unique which is why I have played this game
so many times.

Pros:
interesting map

cons:
very easy and short life span


Overal: I would recommend the game but its a page note in the halflife franchise so I recommend you check out the rest of the franchise, consider this a taste test of how the half life games work overall.

7/10

Хорошее дополнение для Half-Life 2
핲라를 구매하면 딸려오는 게임. 전투하는 게임이고 개인적으로 제일 어렵다고 생각하는 부분은 RPG로 헬기 맞추기인데, 3분만 하다 보면 그 부분도 깰 수 있다. 거머리회 먹으러 왔다가 콤바인이랑 싸우고 시간없어서 거머리회 못먹는 게임. 그래픽은 엄청나다. 10/10
this is like a doodle in game form. theres no context, and its alright, but dont think about it too hard. might give you whiplash and leave you a bit confused though.
啊哈哈想当初接触的第一款半条命就是这个了，才玩了半个小时不到就通关了，让我以为半条命2的流程特别短……（但是当我玩半条命2时却晕的一比= =）游戏里的注释很有意思，很有科普意味（雾）并且隐约体现了他们对地图的精心雕琢以及对游戏节奏设计的精巧（为什么G胖全程只说了两句话！？）。遗憾的是G胖只说了两句话= =
